dcterms:creator: Hideya Ochiai
Yuwei Sun
Qingzhe Jin
Nattanon Wongwiwatchai
Hiroshi Esaki
dcterms:description: A Non-IID version of the MNIST dataset used for training in a wireless ad hoc federated learning framework, where 90% of each node's data is composed of samples from its corresponding label, and the remaining 10% is uniformly composed of other labels without overlaps among nodes.
dcterms:title: Non-IID MNIST dataset

dcterms:creator: Hideya Ochiai
Yuwei Sun
Qingzhe Jin
Nattanon Wongwiwatchai
Hiroshi Esaki
dcterms:description: The standard MNIST dataset used for testing in a wireless ad hoc federated learning framework, which is IID and serves as a benchmark for evaluating the performance of the models trained on the Non-IID MNIST dataset.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset
